content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day November 20, 2019 Exploiting CAPTCHA The Latest Evasive Phishing Tactic November 20, 2019 The Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart CAPTCHA has been used in commercial applications since the early 2000s. As its name suggests, it is a mechanism for ascertaining that a real human is performing an action at a web site.
